turns.content: Can you write a sample rental agreement for a residential property?

Certainly! Here is a sample rental agreement for a residential property that you can use as a starting point:

RENTAL AGREEMENT

This Rental Agreement (the "Agreement") is made and entered into on \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (date) by and between Sal (the "Landlord"), and Senior Citizen Care, Inc. (the "Tenant").

1. Property. The Landlord hereby leases to the Tenant the property located at \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (address), consisting of a single-family home with \_\_\_\_ bedrooms and \_\_\_\_ bathrooms (the "Property").
2. Term. The term of this Agreement shall begin on \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (start date) and end on \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (end date). The Tenant may renew this Agreement upon mutual agreement of the parties.
3. Rent. The Tenant shall pay the Landlord a monthly rent of $\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (rent amount), due on the \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (due date) of each month. The Tenant shall also pay a security deposit of $\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (security deposit) to the Landlord, which shall be returned at the end of the tenancy, subject to any deductions for unpaid rent, damages, or cleaning fees.
4. Occupancy. The Tenant shall use the Property solely for the purpose of providing housing and care to senior citizens, and shall not allow more than \_\_\_\_ senior citizens to reside on the Property at any time. The Tenant shall not sublet the Property or allow any unauthorized occupants to reside on the Property.
5. Maintenance. The Tenant shall maintain the Property in good condition and repair, and shall promptly notify the Landlord of any needed repairs or maintenance. The Landlord shall be responsible for repairing or replacing any major appliances, heating or cooling systems, or other fixtures that are provided by the Landlord.
6. Insurance. The Tenant shall obtain and maintain liability insurance that covers any accidents or injuries that may occur on the Property.
7. Inspections. The Landlord may conduct regular inspections of the Property to ensure that the Tenant is complying with the terms of this Agreement and taking proper care of the Property.
8. Termination. Either party may terminate this Agreement upon \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (notice period) days' written notice to the other party. The Tenant shall vacate the Property on or before the termination date, and shall leave the Property in a clean and undamaged condition.
9. Legal Provisions. This Agreement is governed by the laws of \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (state), and any legal action arising out of or related to this Agreement shall be brought in the courts of \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ (county).

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.

---

Sal, Landlord Senior Citizen Care, Inc., Tenant
